website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, Briogeo Curl Charisma is recommended for consumers who prefer natural ingredients, and delivers noticeable improvement in most types of curls.
pros: A "clean" product that doesn't have harsh additives, including sulfates, silicone, or parabens
Uses plant-based extracts and rice amino acids to naturally moisturize hair and tame frizz
Package is made of 25% recycled materials
cons: May not be moisturizing enough for very dry hair
Doesn't define curls as well as other conditioners on our list, especially when used on tight or coily curls

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT the correct product. Typically this product is liquid in consistency and creates nice slip in my hair. This one is CLEARLY a fraud. The product smells different than it should and is so thick it can't be pushed out of the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Shaff

customer_reviews.title: This item is fraudulent/fake
customer_reviews.text: Believe the other bad reviews and buy this product direct from a hair salon, not from Amazon. I purchased this item to replace the one I recently finished from Sephora. The smell is way off and the consistency is not the same. This is not really Briogeo product. It is a knock-off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this product for curly hair. The conditioner dried my hair out and the shampoo was a nightmare to wash off. As soon as either one of the products touched my hair, I could barely get my fingers through it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer_Lo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My curly hair has gotten so long that finding a conditioner I can actually work through my hair had become impossible! This works so well and is a complete game changer! Never put much weight on hair type specific shampoos and conditioners until today! Still probably going to buy it at Sephora next time after reading the fraudulent product comments.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Curls even in high humidity.
customer_reviews.text: It’s too small. I would like a larger bottle option, but this product is perfect! I thought the product I was using previously curled my hair well. This curls even better!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Gone Bad
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 3 years and loved it. It kept my waves looking great, was not heavily perfumed and was not tested on animals. I just received a new bottle. After reading the ingredients list and seeing it appears to have been reformulated, I gave it a try. Plain and simple, it doesn't do the job. You know it's a bad sign when the second ingredient used to be aloe, and now it's alcohol. Plus there is no indication that it is no longer tested on animals.
customer_reviews.author: writermom 3

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective and All Natural!
customer_reviews.text: I keep turning back to this conditioner (and shampoo) because it works so well. My 3A curls go from frizzy on top and not formed very well to totally curly. It’s nice to have more good hair days! Also, I love how most of the ingredients are healthy - a very important factor in things I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioner for curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This conditioner does wonders for my hair. The formula is thick and makes my curly hair very silky with a small amount of product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Not the actual Brioge product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what was in the bottle I received, but it was not Briogeo product, it was some other type of cheap conditioner that they were trying to make seem like the real deal. Just buy straight from a salon or beauty store, because this was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlynn Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Great for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I love the moisturizing effects of this conditioner. It makes my curly fine hair look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Winkelmann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this conditioner. It works for curly hair! Smells great too
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Biolage better and cheaper
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time rating a product bc I found that Biolage kept my hair moisturized for longer after a shower and it’s less expensive than this product (I have fine hair that breaks easily) wouldn’t buy this stuff again
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: It's almost solid, won't come out of the bottle
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a fake product or what happened, but this product is so think it wont come out of the bottle. Closer to paste or a semi-solid shea butter lotion. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Marie

customer_reviews.title: Soft, workable curls. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner, makes my hair soooo soft!!! Especially after using the paired shampoo! Plus, I'm using half the amount of conditioner that I used to have to use, and getting a great effect. My wavy-curls (2B, I think) are much happier now that I've switched, and I've been getting complements.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for curly hair. I often use this conditioner by itself between shampoos, and it adds life back into my curls. It doesn't weigh my curls down but does control the frizz. I like it so much that I'm going to purchase more Briogeo products for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ashly Guernaccini
